DOC.brief_summary: Two 15 % subject present dysphagia . In case normal eso-gastro-duodenal endoscopy , patient dysphagia refer esophageal motility test . Esophageal manometry gold standard evaluate esophageal motility absence esophageal obstruction . Two different technique available : conventional manometry high resolution manometry . The second one may improve diagnostic yield tolerance examination patient dysphagia .
